hero.title: When families don't understand each other
hero.subtitle: Weaver helps you translate between different thinking styles and strengthen family bonds

problem.title: Do you recognize your family?
problem.subtitle: Many Swedish families experience the same challenges when different thinking styles clash
problem.challenge1_description: "We discuss the children's school time but never seem to agree. Everyone has different opinions but no one listens to each other."
problem.challenge2_description: "Our 15-year-old doesn't seem to understand our explanations and we don't understand her way of thinking. Conversations often end in frustration."
problem.challenge3_description: "Every family decision becomes a discussion. We have different ways of analyzing situations and rarely reach solutions everyone is satisfied with."

weaver.title: Meet Weaver
weaver.subtitle: Your AI family assistant that helps you understand each other better
weaver.feature1_description: Weaver understands that everyone in the family thinks differently and helps you communicate in a way everyone understands.
weaver.feature2_description: Built with the lagom principle and deep understanding of Swedish family traditions and values.
weaver.feature3_description: Helps you not only communicate better, but also understand and appreciate each other's unique ways of thinking.

solution.title: Weaver helps you in everyday life
solution.subtitle: Two concrete ways Weaver supports your family every day
solution.feature1_title: Smart family chat with Weaver's comments
solution.feature1_description: Weaver reads your family chat and provides discreet suggestions to improve communication. No intrusive AI - just helpful tips when you need them.
solution.feature1_benefit1: Helps interpret teenager's "whatever" and suggests how to respond
solution.feature1_benefit2: Suggests when it might be good to call instead of text
solution.feature1_benefit3: Reminds about important family activities in a natural way
solution.feature2_title: Around the kitchen table - ambient listening
solution.feature2_description: When the family discusses, Weaver can analyze the conversation and suggest solutions that consider everyone's wishes. Focuses on what is said, not who says it.
solution.feature2_benefit1: Analyzes conversation content to find different wishes
solution.feature2_benefit2: Suggests creative compromises based on what is discussed
solution.feature2_benefit3: Only activated when the family chooses to use the feature
solution.feature2_example1: "I think we should go to the mountains this weekend"
solution.feature2_suggestion: "I hear someone wants to go to the mountains and someone else wants to paint. How about bringing painting supplies to the mountain cabin?"

chat.weaver_message: "Emma seems frustrated. Maybe ask if she needs to talk or just wants some space?"
chat.mom_message: Hey sweetheart, sounds like a tough day. Want to talk or should I just give you some space? ❤️

technology.subtitle: Three options that suit different families and technical needs
technology.option3_feature2: All data stays at home - no cloud connection

technology.option3_feature4: Discreet design for kitchen or living room
technology.help_text: Unsure which option suits your family?

trust.title: Built for Swedish families
trust.subtitle: With respect for your values and understanding of Swedish family traditions
trust.feature1_description: Your family conversations stay within the family. No data is shared or sold.
trust.feature2_description: Not too much, not too little - just the right amount of AI support for your family.
trust.feature3_description: Designed to strengthen family bonds, not replace human contact.
